thread.title: Research and Markets: The Future of Asia Pacific Exploration and Production Industry to 2020 (H2 2015)
thread.title_full: Research and Markets: The Future of Asia Pacific Exploration and Production Industry to 2020 (H2 2015)

title: Research and Markets: The Future of Asia Pacific Exploration and Production Industry to 2020 (H2 2015)
text:
DUBLIN--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/7wwfsr/the_future_of ) has announced the addition of the "The Future of Asia Pacific Exploration and Production Industry to 2020 (H2 2015)" report to their offering. 
This report analyses the future of Asia Pacific exploration and production industry. The report provides complete details of growth opportunities in the industry along with current status of E&P activities in each country. Outlook of the industry amidst declining oil prices and firm stance of OPEC countries and declining activities in the US shale exploration are detailed in the report. 
Exploration blocks available as of 2015 and forecast of oil and gas production by countries are provided in the research work. Details of production in all major oil and gas fields across the Asia Pacific are provided in detail. 
Revenues, capex and reserves of the top 5 oil and gas companies are provided in the report along with their detailed upstream operations and SWOT analysis. Market structure of oil and gas production is provided for each of the existing upstream countries in the Asia Pacific. 
Key Topics Covered:
